amendment.description: Amendment sought to make $870,031,000 available for NextGen capital programs.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to designate $870,031,000 be available for NextGen facilities and equipment.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (FL) amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 109 - 300 (Roll no. 424).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hastings (FL) amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 109 - 300 (Roll no. 424).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A009) offered by Mr. Hastings (FL).
